function.name: normalisation_tool
function.description: Normalizes the input csvs present in the session storate. Use the default values unless specified otherwise.

ref_compound.description: Reference compound for normalization. Only needed for CompNorm.

function.name: clustering_tool
function.description: Performs clustering, If there are multiple regions then it concatenates the regions and then performs clustering . This also generates the UMAP and Clustering plots as output.

region_list.description: List of regions to be clustered.

modality.description: Omics data (e.g., pool, metabolomics, lipidomics, glycomics) for all the regions passed in regions.

harmony.description: Whether to use Harmony for batch effect correction. Defaults to true.

function.name: integration_tool
function.description: Integrates the data two different clustring result h5ad files and maps (finds corresponding clusters) first files clusters to the second file. It also generates umap and cluster plots.

file_path1.description: Path to the first clustering result h5ad file.

file_path2.description: Path to the second(reference) clustering result h5ad file.

function.description: Find marker molecules for single-cell analysis. Performs statistical analysis to identify differentially expressed features between clusters (single dataset mode) or between corresponding clusters of two datasets (dual dataset comparison mode).
function.name: markers_tool

file1.description: Name of the .h5ad file to find markers for (case/primary dataset).

file2.description: Name of the second .h5ad file for comparison (control/reference dataset). If None, performs single-dataset marker analysis.

abundance.description: Minimum abundance threshold for filtering features. Features must have this minimum expression level to be considered.

adj_pval_cutoff.description: Adjusted p-value cutoff for statistical significance. Only markers with adjusted p-value <= this threshold will be retained.

prevalance.description: Minimum prevalence threshold (fraction of cells expressing the feature). Features must be expressed in at least this fraction of cells (pct1 > 0.1 and pct2 > 0.1).

top_n_molecules.description: Maximum number of top marker molecules to return per cluster comparison, ranked by absolute average log2 fold change.

function.description: Performs pathway enrichment analyses on the provided markers file, saves results in a csv file.
function.name: pathway_tool

marker_file.description: filename of csv marker file containing markker data.

function.description: generates and saves pathway visualization for the provided pathaway csv file and cluster.
function.name: pathway_viz_tool

pathaway_file.description: Path to the pathway csv file containing pathway data. generated by the pathway_tool function.

cluster.description: Cluster name for which the pathway visualization is generated.

top_n_dot.description: Number of top pathways to visualize in the dot plot.

top_n_network.description: Number of top pathways to visualize in the network plot.

top_n_bar.description: Number of top pathways to visualize in the bar plot.
